RomanianStemmer.methodObject = new RomanianStemmer();

RomanianStemmer.a_0 = [
  new Among('', -1, 3),
  new Among('I', 0, 1),
  new Among('U', 0, 2)
];

RomanianStemmer.a_1 = [
  new Among('ea', -1, 3),
  new Among('a\u0163ia', -1, 7),
  new Among('aua', -1, 2),
  new Among('iua', -1, 4),
  new Among('a\u0163ie', -1, 7),
  new Among('ele', -1, 3),
  new Among('ile', -1, 5),
  new Among('iile', 6, 4),
  new Among('iei', -1, 4),
  new Among('atei', -1, 6),
  new Among('ii', -1, 4),
  new Among('ului', -1, 1),
  new Among('ul', -1, 1),
  new Among('elor', -1, 3),
  new Among('ilor', -1, 4),
  new Among('iilor', 14, 4)
];

  new Among('ivitati', -1, 3),
